Html:
Howdy,

I just downloaded and configured phpexcel, great library.

I am able to generate my excel files perfectly but when

trying to output pdf ( PHPExcel_Writer_PDF inplace of PHPExcel_Writer_Excel2007 )

i am always getting zero bytes output.

Any guess what could be wrong ?

 

thanks

Pari

never mind 

 

forgot to include the writer - require_once 'PHPExcel/Writer/PDF.php';

 

lol
